subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Karl Dorrell, U.C.L.A.’s ousted coach, has decided not to coach the Bruins when they play Brigham Young in the Pioneer Las Vegas Bowl on Dec. 22. Dorrell said yesterday that he thought it was in the team’s best interest if he was not at the game. DeWayne Walker, the Bruins’ defensive coordinator, will serve as the interim coach.;Karl Dorrell, U.C.L.A.’s ousted coach, has decided not to coach the Bruins when they play Brigham Young in the Pioneer Las Vegas Bowl on Dec. 22. Dorrell said yesterday that he thought it was in the team’s best interest if he was not at the game. DeWayne Walker, the Bruins’ defensive coordinator, will serve as the interim coach.
